column2:
"I'm sorry to make this request during
the long-awaited celebrations. "

"I asked Franka and she tells me
that Vol Dragon meat is
a delicacy!"

"Since there happens to be dragorii in the residential area
if I could get you to gather some while you fight them off
you'd be killing two birds with one stone."

"Let's show the people who fled
here all the hospitality we can!"

"せっかくのお祝いの最中に
こんなお願いをしてごめんなさい。"

"フランカさんに聞いたんだけど
ヴォル・ドラゴンのお肉は
絶品だそうよ！"

"ちょうど龍族が市街地にいることだし
撃退ついでに集めてもらえたら
一石二鳥だと思うの。"

"逃げてきた人たちに
精一杯のおもてなしをしようよ！"
